2010-07-27

I love living in the future #3 : Mogwai - Burning - A shared experience

I love living in the future - I've just watched the new Mogwai film streamed live over the Internet and watched it with 2000 other people... reading what they thought on Twitter and saying what I thought.

The stream struggled with the images and the sound will be better at some point - but the experience was lovely... and the film will be worth seeing properly with the sound turned up really really loud soon.
